BoxLocalization.Label: Database
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines data source and its parameters

Action.Name: TestConnectionString
Action.Label: Test connection string
Action.Hint: This will test connection to database with entered connection string.

Action.Name: ReloadInfo
Action.Label: Reload info
Action.Hint: This will reload structure and statisticts information abou database, datamatrix and columns.

Socket.Name: ConnectionString
Socket.Label: ODBC connection string
Socket.Hint: Connection string for ODBC data source that defines database for analyzing.

Socket.Name: DataSource
Socket.Label: Data souce
Socket.Hint: The server name or file name of the data source.

Socket.Name: Driver
Socket.Label: Driver
Socket.Hint: The name of the ODBC driver specified for the current connection.

Socket.Name: ServerVersion
Socket.Label: Version of server
Socket.Hint: The version of the server to which the client is connected.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: DataMatrix
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Data matrix @Name
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box corresponding to the table @Name

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AllDataMatrixes
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: All data matrixes in DB
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates boxes for all data matrixes in this databse.

Phrase.PhraseText: Connecting to database with specified connection string succeeded.
Connecting to database with specified connection string failed!
